faq-vps.title: VPS Hosting FAQ
faq-vps.subtitle: Technical details regarding our high-performance Virtual Private Servers
faq-vps.question1: Do I get full Root access?
faq-vps.question2: Can I use the VPS for hosting multiple game servers?
faq-vps.question3: Is the storage NVMe or SSD?
faq-vps.question4: Which Operating Systems can I install?
faq-vps.question5: What virtualization technology do you use?
faq-vps.answer1: Yes, every VPS comes with full administrative (Root/Administrator) access. You have total control over the operating system, software installations, and security configurations.
faq-vps.answer2: Yes! A VPS is perfect for power users who want to run multiple game instances, web servers, or databases simultaneously under a single dedicated environment.
faq-vps.answer3: Yes, we provide both NVMe and SSD storage tiers. Our NVMe plans offer industry-leading speeds for database-heavy applications, while our SSD plans provide reliable, cost-effective performance.
faq-vps.answer4: We offer a wide range of Linux distributions including Ubuntu, CentOS, and Debian. We also support Windows Server options for users who require a Windows environment.
faq-vps.answer5: We utilize KVM (Kernel-based Virtual Machine) and QEMU virtualization. This ensures that your resources are dedicated entirely to you and cannot be 'oversold,' providing stable, consistent, and hardware-level performance.
